mapper.insert: insert into member(memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberPhoneNumber, memberEmail, point, adminCk, tier, address1, address2, address3, joinData) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberEmail}, 0, 0, 'R', #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where memberId = #{memberId}

select m.memberId, m.memberPw, m.memberName, m.memberPhoneNumber, m.memberEmail, m.point, m.adminCk, g.codeName, m.address1, m.address2, m.address3 from member as m join grade as g on m.tier = g.code where memberId = #{memberId}
select memberId FROM member WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail} AND memberName = #{memberName} AND memberPhoneNumber = #{memberPhoneNumber}
mapper.update: update member set memberPw = #{memberPw} where memberEmail = #{memberEmail} and memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where memberEmail = #{memberEmail} and memberId = #{memberId}
